attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1976

Date: 2003-12-10

                                                                                            (T.B. Rec. 831067)


                 Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport and the Treasury Board, hereby authorizes the Minister of Transport, on behalf of Her Majesty in right of Canada, to enter


(a) into agreements, substantially in accordance with the terms and conditions set out in Schedule I hereto, with the following Canadian Airport Authorities:


                 (i)      Greater Toronto Airports Authority,


                 (ii)     Halifax International Airport Authority,


                 (iii)    Ottawa MacDonald-Cartier International Airport Authority,


                 (iv)    Victoria Airport Authority, and


(v)Winnipeg Airports Authority Inc.;


(b) into agreements, substantially in accordance with the terms and conditions set out in Schedule II hereto, with the following Canadian Airport Authorities:


                 (i)    Charlottetown Airports Authority Inc.,


                 (ii)    Greater Fredericton Airport Authority Inc.,


                 (iii)   Gander International Airport Authority Inc.,


                 (iv)   Greater London International Airport Authority,


                 (v)   Greater Moncton Airport Authority Inc.,


.../2


                                                           -2-


 


                 (vi)   Quebec Airport Authority,


                 (vii)  Regina Airport Authority,


                 (viii) Saint John Airport Inc.,


                 (ix)   St. John’s International Airport Authority,


                 (x)   Saskatoon Airport Authority, and


                 (xi)   Thunder Bay International Airports Authority Inc.


 


                                                                                            (Rec. du C.T. 831067)


                     Sur recommandation du ministre des Transports et du Conseil du Trésor, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil autorise le ministre des Transports, au nom de Sa Majesté du chef du Canada, à conclure


a) des accords, conformes en substance aux conditions figurant à l’appendice I ci-joint, avec les administrations aéroportuaires canadiennes suivantes :


                     (i)    Administration aéroportuaire du Grand Toronto,


                     (ii)    Administration de l’aéroport international d’Halifax,


                     (iii)   Administration de l’aéroport international MacDonald-Cartier d’Ottawa,


                     (iv)   Administration aéroportuaire de Victoria,


                     (v)   Administration aéroportuaire de Winnipeg;


b) des accords, conformes en substance aux conditions figurant à l’appendice II ci-joint, avec les administrations aéroportuaires canadiennes suivantes :


                     (i)    Administration aéroportuaire de Charlottetown,


                     (ii)    Administration aéroportuaire du Grand Fredericton,


                     (iii)   Administration de l’aéroport international de Gander,


                     (iv)   Administration de l’aéroport international du Grand London,


                     (v)   Administration aéroportuaire du Grand Moncton,


.../2


                                                     -2-


 

                     (vi)   Aéroport de Québec Inc.,


                     (vii)  Administration aéroportuaire de Regina,


                     (viii) Saint John Airport Inc.,


                     (ix)   Administration de l’aéroport international de St. John’s,


                     (x)   Administration aéroportuaire de Saskatoon,


                     (xi)   Administration de l’aéroport international de Thunder Bay.
